resources.string: Details hasn\'t been fully loaded yet. Wait a couple of seconds and enter again.
Please enable USAGE ACCESS for App Usage Tracker. This app won\'t be able to gather usage statistics without USAGE ACCESS.

Press SET To enable AUTOSTART. Without autostart enabled, App Usage Tracker will stop gathering usage statistics after each reboot unless you manually open the app. If you don\'t see autostart in the settings or you\'ve already enabled autostart then press ALREADY ENABLED.
Your cgpa will only be used for research purpose. Please do not provide wrong information. Your participation will be greatly appreciated.
Please update App Usage Tracker. This update is highly essential for our research.
Please wait a few moments. The first loading takes longer than usual.
App Usage Tracker has entered stage 1. No app usage notification will be shown for the next 7 days. There will be 2 more stages.
App Usage Tracker has entered stage 2. From now on you will get notified for each app you are using for the next 7 days There will be 1 more stage.
App Usage Tracker has entered stage 3. Once again, you won\'t receive any usage notification for the next 7 days. You are almost there! This is the last stage.

All stage has been cleared! Every restriction has been removed. Now you can set targets and notifications as you wish. Thank you very much for keeping App Usage Tracker installed for the past 3 weeks, your participation has benefited us greatly. Now contact us and get your reward!
